title: Vengeful Spirit
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: League 'catching up' to Jackson and Mahomes? Ruggs III, IYHH and the 'biggest lie' voicemails!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones discusses why people saying the league has “caught up” to QB's like Lamar Jackson, Patrick Mahomes and Josh Allen is shortsighted (1:26). Plus, the pushback on Raiders QB Derek Carr’s support of former teammate Henry Ruggs III (17:04), an IYHH including disaster at “Astroworld” (29:04) and your voicemails from the biggest lie that you’ve ever been told (43:07)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @MattWolfeOnAir covers Jay-Z & LL Cool J’s induction into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame: https://bit.ly/3qoxcFr
  2. @WashNews shares that all 8 victims have been identified, cause sought in deadly Travis Scott "Astroworld" concert: https://abcn.ws/3klbm1x
  3. Experts say "Squid Game" crypto coin bust “a scam” via @ABCAudio: https://bit.ly/3oawk4n
